channel.title: Problem with textures
channel.description:
Hello How is everyone? I had problems with the textures of BMS and wanted to know if there is any solution or any program that can repair.
Here you give leave a picture for them to see.
[url]https://www.subirimagenes.net/show-image.php?id=790f67d46cc1c07eefc267aff1ee9f93[/url] [url]https://www.subirimagenes.net/show-image.php?id=d415fa5232f2e634b4352a06f97c3cf9[/url]
[img]https://www.subirimagenes.net/show-image.php?id=790f67d46cc1c07eefc267aff1ee9f93[/img]
[img]https://www.subirimagenes.net/show-image.php?id=d415fa5232f2e634b4352a06f97c3cf9[/img]My system specs
ATI Radeon HD 4350 1Gb. 2GB Ram. Intel Dual Core e5400 2,5 ghz
From already thank everyone attention.
A greeting.
PS: Use the google translator to write this post, sorry for the mistakes.

item.title: Problem with textures
item.dc:creator: ysrael214
item.description:
I had that problem too! But its gone now. It’s the driver that affects the model. Don’t update it with Steam. Go to the driver’s website and download their latest driver (The one that says automatically choose driver)

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with textures
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
All of the textures or only some? Also, fix your pictures.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with textures
item.dc:creator: Welek
item.description:
I tried the above fix and my models and textures are bugging out still. Anymore support? Here are some pictures.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with textures
item.dc:creator: Aguppesce
item.description:
Hello How are you? I could solve the problem of the textures (so far) by doing the following: Removing the drivers of video card from Computer (right click) -> Properties —> (Option) Device Manager —> Adapters screen —> (right click) on ATI Radeon HD 4300/4500 Series (in my case) and then put uninstall.

   Then Windows detect missing drives and automatically download and install.

That solved the problem regarding the textures, the only thing I still have to resolve the errors are displayed on the console, which apparently has something to do with the textures and graphics card, do not know much about these messages displayed on the console in red (see picture). Probare outlive following the steps in this post let me.

https://www.subirimagenes.net/show-image.php?id=d415fa5232f2e634b4352a06f97c3cf9

Thank you for your attention, and I hope that if anyone has the same problem that you serve something.
  
  Greetings to all.

PD1: Use google translator to write this message. Sorry for mistakes in spelling, grammar and others.
PD2: I based this post to fix the problem https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=14831.

Read full topic

Thank you very much for the attention.
